titleStmt.title: Roome, for a messe of knaues Or, a selection, or a detection, or, a demonstration, or a manifestation. of foure slaues. Or, a conuiction, or a comiction, or, a combination, or a copulation of foure varlets. Or, a reperition, or a repetition. Or, a replication, or a recapitulation. of foure harlets. With a narration or a declaration, a relation or an explication, of a strange (but true) battell, fought in the little Isle (or worlde) of Man.
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630? Knave of clubbes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for N[athaniel. F[osbrooke] and are to be sold at the signe of the Talbot at the west end of Paules,

notesStmt.note: An anonymous imitation of: Rowlands, Samuel. The knave of clubbes.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Running title reads: A messe of knaues.
Identified as STC 21314 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Talbot at the west end of Paules
